text_block_list.text:
While listening to the sound of pouring rain, I stared 
at the monitor――I was looking over Dream Journey's data.

It had been a short while since I had become her trainer. So far 
there haven't been any problems. It was going almost too smoothly.
But that's why――

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
My memory is on the good side, I'd say. 
When I enrolled and first saw you……I knew exactly who you were.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Someone who would give up your spot to some unknown 
girl, honestly open up about themselves when talking 
to others……It left quite an impression.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
There was noone that could have been more desirable. 
As the kind of trainer I would want……

Maybe I was just dancing in the palm of her hand…… 
that was the thought that crossed my mind.

I thought back to the plan she showed me when 
we first formed a contract. It was a thoroughly 
thought out, perfectly planned three years.

『Easy to handle』 
――I don't agree with that. I couldn't.

I need to find some way to be valuable to her. 
In a real sense, I needed to find a way to be necessary.

To do that, I would need to put in more effort 
than an average person. I needed to learn alot, 
experience a lot, and then maybe someday――

I took the first page of her plans, folded it neatly and put it 
in my wallet. I'd use it as a charm to remind me of my decision.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text: So you're here today too.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Lately, you've been coming to the library pretty often…… 
Is there something that you're interested in?

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
I see. 
Trainer-san is really passionate about studying, huh?

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
That being said, please don't push yourself too hard. Perhaps 
it's because of the rain, but today is just a little chilly……

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
So I hope you don't catch a cold. 
If you were to collapse, it would all be for naught.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
If there are any problems, let me know. Let's 
think about them together. Personally, I would 
like to see you rewarded for your efforts.

Her words and voice overflowed with concern for me. 
Normally, I would take her words at face value, but……

I couldn't help but think about her true 
intentions behind those word. I looked to 
the stack of books on the desk and shook my head.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text: It's nothing worth mentioning, Trainer-san.

When I looked out of the window, the rain had 
stopped and the sun was setting. I roll my shoulders 
and then stand up to go home. When I do――

There was a thermos with warm coffee on the desk. Next 
to it was a note saying 『Thanks for your hard work』.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
……honest, kind, sincere, and hardworking. 
Quite the appealing person.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text: I had quite the wonderful encounter.
『……Because I'm easy to handle』

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
Please don't belittle yourself like that. 
You're an amazing trainer.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text: (……Yes, truly. It's not a lie, I believe it wholeheartedly.)

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text: That's why, I hope you don't change.

text_block_list.name: Dream Journey
text_block_list.text:
No matter what kind of journey this becomes. 
I hope you stay the way you were……back when we first met.
